definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
keratin (protein forming nails and feathers etc)

sentences.english: Cytokines are small, soluble proteins with pleiotropic effects on a variety of cell types.
sentences.chinese: 细胞因子是具有多种生物活性的可溶性小分子蛋白质。

sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血红素是血红蛋白的辅基，有极其广泛和重要的应用。

sentences.english: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.chinese: 血红素或球蛋白的正常产生收到干扰会导致贫血。

sentences.english: After pulling off the shell, she observed the hard-boiled egg inside.
sentences.chinese: 当女儿敲碎蛋壳发现里面已经是被煮得很硬的蛋白。

sentences.english: Also a good source of vegetarian protein.
sentences.chinese: 同时也是植物蛋白的好来源。

sentences.english: It seems likely that this protein will attract a great deal more analgesic research.
sentences.chinese: 这种蛋白质可能会引发更多的镇痛剂研究。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一个螺旋卷曲区域，五个蛋白均无信号肽。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一个螺旋卷曲区域，五个蛋白均无信号肽。

sentences.english: Study on the optimum dietary protein level for laying Shao Ducks.
sentences.chinese: 绍鸭产蛋期日粮蛋白质水平的研究。

sentences.english: The protein expression of TLR2 in the liver was detected by immunohistochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 免疫组织化学观察肝组织TLR2蛋白的表达。

sentences.english: In addition to CMPA, they were allergic to other food at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 除对牛乳蛋白过敏外，同时也对其他食物过敏。

sentences.english: The recombinant N protein is potentially valuable antigen for serological tests and immunoprophlaxis of PRRS.
sentences.chinese: 表达蛋白可望成为有价值的PRRS诊断抗原。

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

sentences.english: Glutaraldehyde can strengthen the conjugation of NCF with protein.
sentences.chinese: 用戊二醛处理硝酸纤维素膜可以增强蛋白吸附。

sentences.english: Immunohistochemistry showed that ERK protein were mainly located in cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 免疫组织化学显示ERK蛋白主要位于细胞浆内。

sentences.english: The author introduced current knowledge of the mechanisms of histone H2B ubiquitination and its significance.
sentences.chinese: 笔者介绍了组蛋白H2B的泛素化机制及其意义。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
